title: Vaccination centers to be closed only on first day of Eid
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): National Command and Operation Center (NCOC) has said that vaccination centers across the country will remain closed for only one day (21st July).
Vaccination centers across the country will remain closed for only one day (21st July). Get vaccinated and please ensure that COVID SOPs are being followed. Have a safe and blessed Eid!
â€” NCOC (@OfficialNcoc) July 20, 2021
In a Tweet on Tuesday, NCOC asked the citizens to get vaccinated and ensure that COVID SOPs are being followed.
